10:
```json
{
    "Task 0": "
# Step 1: Open the note containing the item 'Shopping List'
tap($open_note)
# Assuming we need to find and tap the note containing 'Shopping List'
open_note_titles = $open_note_title_list
for note_title in open_note_titles:
    if 'Shopping List' in get_text(note_title):
        tap(note_title)
        break
# Step 2: Renaming the checklist item 'Shopping List' to 'Groceries List'
checklist_items = $checklist_item_list
for item in checklist_items:
    if 'Shopping List' in get_text(item):
        long_tap(item)
        tap($rename_selected_checklist_item)
        rename_input = $item_title
        set_text(rename_input, 'Groceries List')
        tap($rename_ok)
        break
",
    "Task 1": "
# Step 1: Check if a checklist note is open and open one if not
checklist_open = False
if len($checklist_item_list) > 0:
    checklist_open = True
# else, open a checklist note
if not checklist_open:
    tap($open_note)
    open_note_titles = $open_note_title_list
    for note_title in open_note_titles:
        if 'Checklist' in get_text(note_title):
            tap(note_title)
            break
            checklist_open = True
# Step 2: Open more options for the current checklist
tap($more_options_checklist)
",
    "Task 2": "
# Step 1: Ensure a note titled 'Grocery List' exists and is opened
note_found = False
tap($open_note)
open_note_titles = $open_note_title_list
for title in open_note_titles:
    if 'Grocery List' in get_text(title):
        tap(title)
        note_found = True
        break
if not note_found:
    tap($create_note)
    set_text($add_note_title, 'Grocery List')
    tap($text_note_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)
# Step 2: Execute the typical function to print the current note's content
print(get_text($note_content))
",
    "Task 3": "
# Step 1: Check if any note or checklist is opened
note_opened = False
if len($checklist_item_list) > 0 or 'note_content' in str($note_content):
    note_opened = True
if not note_opened:
    tap($open_note)
# Open the first note if required
open_note_titles = $open_note_title_list
if len(open_note_titles) > 0:
    tap(open_note_titles[0])
# Step 2: Show the title of the current note
print(get_text($item_title))
",
    "Task 4": "
# Check the current font size
print(get_text($current_font_size))
"
}
```

```json
{
    "Task 0": "tap($settings)
scroll($scroll_settings_page, 'down')",
    "Task 1": "# Step 1: Create checklist items
tap($create_note)
tap($checklist_type)
tap($add_note_ok)
tap($add_checklist_item)
set_text($add_checklist_item_title, 'Checklist Item 1')
tap($add_checklist_item_ok)
tap($add_checklist_item)
set_text($add_checklist_item_title, 'Checklist Item 2')
tap($add_checklist_item_ok)
tap($add_checklist_item)
set_text($add_checklist_item_title, 'Checklist Item 3')
tap($add_checklist_item_ok)

# Step 2: Mark some items as done
tap($checklist_item_list[0])

# Step 3: Remove all done items
tap($more_options_checklist)
tap($remove_done_checklist_items)",
    "Task 2": "# Step 1: Open a checklist note
notes = $open_note_title_list.match({'text': 'Meeting at 3PM'})
if not notes:
    tap($create_note)
    tap($checklist_type)
    set_text($add_note_title, 'Meeting at 3PM')
    tap($add_note_ok)
else:
    tap(notes[0])

# Step 2: Rename the checklist item
tap($checklist_item_list.match({'text': 'Meeting at 3PM'})[0])
long_tap($checklist_item_list.match({'text': 'Meeting at 3PM'})[0])
tap($rename_selected_checklist_item)
set_text($rename_input, 'Team Meeting at 3PM')
tap($rename_ok)",
    "Task 3": "# Step 1: Open or create a checklist note
if not len($open_note_title_list.match({'text': 'Checklist'})):
    tap($create_note)
    tap($checklist_type)
    set_text($add_note_title, 'Checklist')
    tap($add_note_ok)
else:
    tap($open_note_title_list.match({'text': 'Checklist'})[0])

# Step 2: Confirm the current checklist sorting type
tap($more_options_checklist)
tap($sort_checklist_items)
for sort_type in $sort_checklist_items_types:
    if get_attributes(sort_type)["checked"]:
        print(get_text(sort_type))
tap($sort_checklist_items_ok)",
    "Task 4": "# Step 1: Open any existing note or create a new one
notes_list = $open_note_title_list
if len(notes_list) == 0:
    tap($create_note)
    tap($text_note_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)
else:
    tap(notes_list[0])

# Step 2: Enable Incognito mode for keyboards
tap($settings)
scroll($scroll_settings_page, 'down')
tap($set_use_incognito_mode_of_keyboards)
back()"
}
```
